newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0805 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Steady to up 0.100 cent. Active feedlot movement last week and strong demand for boxed beef but commercial hedging still seen as fed number to rise soon.
FEEDER CATTLE - Up 0.100 to off 0.100 cent. May follow live cattle and steady corn call but index easier.
LEAN HOGS - Off 0.100 to 0.200 cent. Steady to lower cash hog calls and weak cash pork complex, but hog run still light.
PORK BELLIES - Off 0.200 to 0.500 cent. Break in cash market last week, market is technically weak.
